text: he muminasakala! Tomalokara dayitba tomalokara oparate'i. Tomaloke yadi satpathata paraicalita horaa tente yiye pathabhrasta haiche si tomalokara kono ksati karaiba noraaraiba. Allahara pine'i tomaloka sakalorae pratyarartana, tara pichata tomaloke yi karaichila se'i sambandhe te'om tomalokaka arahita karaiba
